overview: Gauri: The Unborn is a 2007 Hindi film directed by Akku Akbar, starring Atul Kulkarni and Rituparna Sen Gupta. It received great critical acclaim, but commercially was an average grosser. The film was produced by Shogun Films. [1]  It was remade as a Malayalam film, Kana Kanmani (2009) directed by Akku Akbar.
title: Gauri The Unborn
